Page Templates

This section collects commonly-used page templates that are useful as a starting point for similar use cases.

  • About the design system

    The about page should provide a bit more high-level information about the system, who's behind it, its back story, and any other info that's helpful to lay out.

  • Contributing to the design system

    This page explains the process (or processes) by which the design system gets updated

  • Downloads

    Links to repositories, design templates, tools, and so on.

  • App Gallery

    The app gallery showcases apps created using the design system. This helps provide credibility to the system, incentivizes teams to use the system, and provides a handy reference to see components in the wild.

  • Getting Started

    The getting started page should provide information for how to get up and running with the design system.

  • Release history

  • Adventist Identity Guideline System

    A home for the Adventist Identity Guideline System documentation.

  • Release History

    Jekyll's built-in [blogging feature](http://import.jekyllrb.com/) could be a good way to communicate changes and updates to the design system. See [Material Design's What's New page](https://material.io/guidelines/material-design/whats-new.html) for inspiration.

  • Roadmap

    The roadmap shows the plan of attack for upcoming releases to the design system

  • Support

    The support page provides information about getting help with using the design system
  • About
  • Roadmap
  • Release History
  • Contribute
